mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, SUM(b.room_stock) AS 'roomstock', MIN(b.room_price) AS 'price' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS b ON a.`acc_id` = b.`acc_id` WHERE
AND `accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND b.`room_maxNum` >= #{headcount}
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`
HAVING (`price` BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice})
ORDER BY a.`acc_review` DESC
ORDER BY a.`acc_rate` DESC
ORDER BY `price` ASC
ORDER BY ST_Distance_Sphere(a.`acc_xy`, ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{lng}, ' ', #{lat}, ')'))) asc
LIMIT #{offset}, 10;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.acc_id) FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a
JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS b
JOIN (SELECT * FROM `lemo_product_room` WHERE room_price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice}) AS b
ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id
WHERE
ST_Distance_Sphere(`acc_xy`, ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{lng}, ' ', #{lat}, ')'))) <= 5000
MBRContains( ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('LineString(', #{b}, ')')), `acc_xy`)
AND `accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND b.`room_maxNum` >= #{headcount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY a.room_price, IFNULL(a.empty_room_stock, a.room_stock) desc) 'order' FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.acc_name, a.acc_addr, a.acc_addrDetail, a.acc_longtitude, a.acc_lattitude, a.acc_xy, a.acc_mainInfo, a.acc_info, a.acc_comment, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, r.room_maxNum 'room_maxNum', r.room_id, r.room_price 'room_price', r.room_stock 'room_stock', IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', SUM(IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock)) OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id) 'sum_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id', (r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id
WHERE
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > '2023-03-05' AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < '2023-03-06')
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id
WHERE
ORDER BY a.acc_id) a WHERE (a.empty_room_stock != 0 OR (a.sum_room_stock = 0 AND a.top = 1)) AND a.room_maxNum > 1 ) a WHERE a.order = 1
AND `accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND (`room_price` BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice})
LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
